service.title: graph-tool service
service.author: Mitsuhrio ETO
service.description: Simple service applying basic graph layout algorithm

parameters.name: root
parameters.description: The root of the radial tree.

parameters.name: pin
parameters.description: A name of vertex attribute with boolean values, which, if given, specify the vertices which will not have their positions modified.

parameters.name: groups
parameters.description: A name of vertex attribute with group assignments. Vertices belonging to the same group will be put close together.

parameters.name: pos
parameters.description: A name of initial vertex layout attribute. If not provided, it will be randomly chosen.

parameters.name: weight
parameters.description: Attribute name of an edge attribute with the respective weights

parameters.name: rel_order
parameters.description: Attribute name of relative order of the nodes at each respective branch.

parameters.name: node_weight
parameters.description: Attribute name of the relative spacing between leafs will correspond to the node weights.
